SGT Melver often reminds fellow El Pasoans about the Old Glory Memorial where the 180 ft. flagpole flies a 5000 square foot flag to remind us all the responsibility and importance of what it means to be an American.   Happy #VeteransDay SGT Melver!

SGT Jimmy Melver was drafted into the Army in 1965. After serving our country SGT Melver worked for the El Paso Natural Gas for over 30 years.   SGT Melver is known as the flagman in El Paso for his work and leadership with Flags Across America and the Old Glory Memorial. https://t.co/sy0qLgN2wY
